data.eml:eml: Aphaereta ceratitivora sp. n. (Hymenoptera, Braconidae), a new parasitoid of Ceratitis capitata (Wiedemann) (Diptera, Tephritidae) from the Azores

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Achterberg, Kees van, Teixeira, Tania, Oliveira, Luisa (2012): Aphaereta ceratitivora sp. n. (Hymenoptera, Braconidae), a new parasitoid of Ceratitis capitata (Wiedemann) (Diptera, Tephritidae) from the Azores. ZooKeys 222: 1-9, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.222.3618, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.222.3618
